channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are introduced to some simple woodcraft in the woods with Mr Wolf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad in 'Camping Out', and then in 'Dinner Party', King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to sample Nanny Plum's cooking.[(96057)]
